div.p: If your student/students will need a meal during the time school is closed, please fill out this form. A district employee will contact you to make arrangements for pickup. One week of meals including breakfast and lunch will be provided at a time. (Breakfast will be shelf stable items / Lunch will frozen, microwavable meals)
Meal Request Form *Please fill out one form for each student enrolled.
